meanings.sent1: During the party, Sarah regaled us with funny stories about her cat.
meanings.sent2: The comedian regaled the audience with jokes and anecdotes.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa always regaled us with tales of his adventures as a young man.
meanings.sent4: The storyteller regaled the children with magical tales of faraway lands.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide regaled the tourists with fascinating historical facts about the city.

meanings.definition: Give great pleasure or delight to.
meanings.sent1: The delicious cake regaled our taste buds with its sweet flavor.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful music regaled the audience and brought tears to their eyes.
meanings.sent3: The colorful fireworks display regaled the crowd on the Fourth of July.
meanings.sent4: The stunning sunset regaled us with its vibrant hues painting the sky.
meanings.sent5: The captivating book regaled readers with its thrilling plot twists.
